name: Police Car Parking 3D Simulator
description:
Police is active for pursuit but need some skillful drivers. Get in the car and show your skills and guts.

An awesome adventure of Police Car Parking and carrying few bureaucrats to save location. Yes Sir! You need to be on your toes and complete all 20 levels but wait...... There is timer ticking, might be someone is in danger. You need to drop the bureaucrat to a save location in a hurry.

Features
- HD Graphics
- 20 Levels
- Easy Controls
- Multiple Police Cars
- Awesome Sound Tracks
